trans-unit.source: Result from using <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectResolver" /> to set an effect on text.
trans-unit.target: Resultantes do uso de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectResolver" /> para definir um efeito em texto.

trans-unit.source: This consists of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> created and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> should be set.
trans-unit.target: Isso é composto pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> criado e o <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> para o qual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> deve ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> text effect to text.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como aplicar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> efeito de texto em texto.

trans-unit.target: Abaixo está o código anterior para o exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Disables the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> on the effect target.
trans-unit.target: Desabilita o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> no destino de efeito.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> text effect to text.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> is targeting.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> ao qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> se destina.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> is targeting.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> se destina.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> on the target text.
trans-unit.target: Habilita o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> no texto de destino.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> is already enabled, the method will be a no-op (no operation).
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect> é estiver habilitado, o método será não operacional (nenhuma operação).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> text effect to text.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como aplicar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.TranslateTransform>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ScaleTransform>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.RotateTransform> efeito de texto em texto.

trans-unit.target: Abaixo está o XAML para o exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Below is the code behind for the example.
trans-unit.target: Abaixo está o código anterior para o exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the text effect is enabled on the target element
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que determina se o efeito de texto está habilitado no elemento de destino

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> is enabled on the target; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **True** se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> estiver habilitado no destino; caso contrário, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectTarget" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectTarget" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextEffect" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.TextEffectTarget" />.
